qas.question: How many Jewish people live in the City of Boston?

context: The city has a sizable Jewish population with an estimated <a0_0>25,000<a0_0/> Jews within the city and <a1_0><a2_0>22<a2_0/>7,000<a1_0/> within the Boston metro area; the number of congregations in Boston is estimated at 22.
